K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-4: nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-5: nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-6: nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do; ;rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-7: byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-9: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'god par byed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi rnam par thar ba gzhan med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-12: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:227b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di thugs su chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-2: gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-3: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-4: dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-5: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-6: sems can bcings pa rnams la thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-7: sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzang po nye bar ston par mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-8: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-9: stong pa nyid gsung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-10: stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par rmongs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du; rnam par rig pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa nye bar ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g-yo'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228a-13: rim gyis byang chub kyi snying po thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang nye bar ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas @228b pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-7: khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa chen po bzhi la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-15: chos sbyin pa la ste; sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-24: de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-25: de la gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-27: bu mo yong su gtong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-28: shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang; lag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:228b-33: rkang yongs su gtong ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos @229a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-1: la bzod pa thob pas ni yongs su gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dod chags kyis mi 'jigs lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-6: gti mug gis mi 'jigs lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-12: zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-13: gti mug dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-15: gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-17: de la 'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-19: zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-21: gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-23: de ci'i phyir zhe na; sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-24: 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i 'khri shing kun du 'dzin pa'i phyir nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-25: zhe sdang ni myur du yongs su spong ba'i phyir ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229a-26: gti mug ni rnam par grol ba dka' ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-0: @229b de la byang chub sems dpas nyes pa dang po'i lci ba ni tshogs bcu la dang por bshags par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-1: bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshogs lnga la bshags par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-2: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gam gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-3: byang chub sems dpas mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-4: bud med kyi nyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-7: mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-9: de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-10: de la bshags pa ni 'di yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-12: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-16: rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-18: klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-19: dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-21: rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:229b-22: rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-2: rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-3: dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-6: tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-8: chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-10: tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo; ;gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-12: mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-13: sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-14: me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-18: dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-19: mtshan dpal shin tu yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-20: dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-21: shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-22: g-yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-23: rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230a-24: kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-0: rin chen pad mas rnam @230b par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad mo la rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-2: de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-6: tha ma ma mchis pa nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-7: 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pha'i las bgyis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-9: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-10: mchod rten gyi dkor ram; dge 'dun gyi dkor ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-11: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-13: 'phrog pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-14: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-16: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-17: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-19: 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-20: las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-21: bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:230b-22: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-4: lha tshe ring po rnams kyi dang du skye ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-5: dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-6: lta ba log pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-7: sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-11: mkhyen par gzigs pa de dag gi spyan sngar mthol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-15: slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-18: skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la zas kha ma gcig tsam stsal ba gang lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-19: tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-20: bdag gis sangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-21: bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231a-22: bdag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-0: bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge @231b ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-1: bsdoms nas bla na ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-2: gong na ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-3: gong ma'i yang gong mar yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-4: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bsngos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-5: ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-6: ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-7: sdig pa thams cad bshags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-8: bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-10: bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-11: mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-12: gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-13: yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho 'dra kun la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-14: thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te skyabs su nye bar mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:231b-16: de ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-0: de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa de la sangs rgyas bcom @232a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-1: ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar bar bya ba kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-2: de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g-yo la sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-3: rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-5: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-9: lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-11: khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232a-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni @232b sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-2: tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-4: nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-6: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-8: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-11: de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-12: la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-13: la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-14: la lar ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:232b-15: chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g-yo'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-0: byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can @233a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-1: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang de la bdag tu dmigs pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-2: sems can du dmigs pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-3: sems can rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed pa'i phyir ro; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-5: ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-6: byi las bzod par nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-9: de ni mi bzod lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-13: spos kyi glang po che'i khal gang yin pa de bong bus bzod par nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-16: de ni mi bzod lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-21: tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de mi dbul pos bzod par nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-22: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-24: de ni mi bzod lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233a-27: bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-0: bya rgod kyi phru gus bzod par @233b nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-3: de ni mi bzod lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems dpa' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing shes pa las rnam par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-8: nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam par sbyong bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-11: byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yongs su brjod pa dang phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nyes pa bgyid pa'i gnas la nges par 'gyur zhing ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-12: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-13: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:233b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te; bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-0: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad @234a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-3: 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-6: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa bcas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes gsungs lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-10: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-12: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lags par bka' stsal na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234a-14: ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la mkhas pa mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzung nas mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams la rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan du gsol @234b bar bgyi lags so snyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-2: bdag gcig pu dben par gnas nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-3: sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa yongs su zhu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-4: snyam pa de lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-5: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa rgya cher bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-10: de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor ba gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-11: lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-12: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yang sbyor ba gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-13: lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-17: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:234b-18: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan; lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-0: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs @235a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-2: shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-3: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-4: shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-7: 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba len par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-8: de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-9: de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-10: shin tu 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-12: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-13: shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid du gyur pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235a-15: 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med par srid par skye ba len kyang sems yongs su mi skyo zhing yongs su mi skyo ba de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-0: de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa @235b nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-1: shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-3: de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-4: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-5: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-7: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-8: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-10: 'di la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-13: 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gzhan dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-14: gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par bya dgos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-15: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni mi dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:235b-17: rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-0: @236a *// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-2: ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su yod pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su med pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-5: 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-6: gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-7: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-8: gal te gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-9: phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no; ;gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-10: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236a-11: gal te mtshan mo'i thun dang po la nyes pa byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-0: mtshan mo'i gung thun la thams @236b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-1: gal te mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-2: mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-3: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-5: de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-6: de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-7: ha cang yid la gcags par yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-9: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dang yang du nyes pa byung na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-11: yongs su gtugs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-13: nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:236b-14: de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-0: ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ring du @237a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-1: rjes su zhugs pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-4: 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-6: dga' mgur spyad pa byas kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-7: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-9: nye bar 'khor; theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun tu reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-10: skabs kyang yod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-12: yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni srid pa gcig gis nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-13: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237a-14: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-1: de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-4: de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-6: ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-7: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-9: mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshogs chen po dang ldan pa yin pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-13: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyobs ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar sla pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-16: gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:237b-17: gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mi gsung bar dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-1: dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-7: kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-10: stong pa nyid kyi gtam gsung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-11: de dag gis gtam de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:238a-15: nongs ba gang lags pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-2: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grags gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-3: de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-4: der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-5: rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams byung ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-6: chos rnams 'di dag yi ge'i sgra skad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-7: grangs dang tha snyad gdags par bstan pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-8: chos dang chos min nam yang yod min yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-9: skye bo byis pa rnams la de mi snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-10: sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'jig rten ngas brjod kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-11: ser sna'i chos de'ang dmigs su yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-12: de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams bsam yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-13: de yang dmigs med de yang mthong ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-14: tshul khrims bya pa dag pa ngas bshad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-15: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mkha' la lag pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-16: tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad mkha' 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-17: gang dag tshul bzang de yang de dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-18: bzod pa gya nom nga yis bshad byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-19: de yi rang bzhin na ma yang mthong ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-20: 'di na chos 'ga'ang 'khrug pa yod min yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-21: bzod pa de yang rgyal bas rab tu bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-22: nyin mtshan bag yod bya phyir nga yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-23: mi nyal dam pa bsngags pa brjod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-24: bskal pa brgya snyed brtson 'grus bskyed byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-25: 'phel bar mi 'gyur zad pa yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-26: bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin gya nom pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-27: ji bzhin sgo dag 'gro la bstan byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243a-28: 'di la chos 'ga'ang zad pa yod min yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-0: de dag cha shas phye @243b ste rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-1: shes rab chos rnams shes par gyis shig ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-2: shes rab lhag mthong blo gros ngas bstan kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-3: rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa nam du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-4: shes par mi nus de yang nges par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-5: rab dben mchog shes sbyangs la dga' gyis zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-6: dka' thub ngan pa 'jig rten ngas bshad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-7: mchog shes yongs su mi 'thob gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-8: chos de 'dir ni dmigs su yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-9: sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-10: sems can stong phrag du ma skyob byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-11: gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-12: 'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-13: gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-14: gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-15: rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-16: lus la 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-17: sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-18: gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-19: 'di na de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-20: de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-21: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-22: 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par bye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-23: 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang byung min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-24: yongs su rtogs pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-25: 'gro don byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-26: spyod mchog khyad par 'phags pa bstan byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-27: byang chub nam yang dmigs su yod min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:243b-28: 'dod pa gang yin de yang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-1: ni rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag cang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-2: rngul med rngul bral dri ma med par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-3: byis pa yod pa min la rnam rtog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-4: chags gyur sdang bar 'gyur zhing rmongs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-5: mnyam gzhag gya nom chos ni thob 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-6: 'dod chags yod min sdang med rmongs pa'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-7: 'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol ba'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-8: kun gzhir ma gyur mya ngan 'das pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-9: mkha' 'dra'i chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-10: zhing brgya rnams su thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-11: de dag yid kyang chags pa med 'gyur bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-12: de phyir thogs med lam ni bskyed par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-13: bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-14: sems can brgya phrag mtha' yas grol byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-15: nam yang sems can dmigs su yod min zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-16: zad pa'ang yod min mtha' yas gyur pa'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-17: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'jig rten na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-18: sems can brgya phrag mang po sprul byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-19: sprul pa de dag thams cad bsad gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-20: sgyu ma de dag bsad pa yod min ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-21: 'gro ba 'di kun sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-22: 'di la mtha' ni nam yang dmigs su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-23: gang dag de ltar mtha' yas mos byed pa; ;de dag 'jig rten na ni tshor ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-24: gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-25: dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244a-26: 'dod pa'i yon tan spyod kyang chags med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-0: @244b chags pa rnam spangs sems can 'dul bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-1: 'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-2: mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-3: sems can yod ma yin yang don mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-4: de dag rnams kyi de ni dka' ba che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-5: ji ltar chang pa bcangs te byis pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-6: ston cing lag tu yod ces brjod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-7: de yis chang pa stong pa mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-8: byis pa de ni cho nges ngu ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-9: de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-10: sems can tshul la mkhas shing mkhyen pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-11: chos rnams 'di dag gsob gsog mkhyen gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-12: 'jig rten dag la dngos po bstan pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-13: shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-14: khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu 'byung gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-15: 'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-16: thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-17: khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-18: 'bras bu thams cad thob par 'gyur yang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-19: chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-20: 'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med; ;'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-21: kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-22: rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-23: de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-24: de ltar zhi ba'i chos rnams de dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-25: 'di dag dbang po bsam gtan rnam dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-26: stobs dang byang chub yan lag zhi ba zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:244b-27: ming dang tshig stong snyed kyi bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-1: 'ga' yang ma skyes stobs kyang min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-2: byang chub yan lag zhi ba'ang ma skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-3: chos 'di gzugs can ma yin gzugs med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-4: 'jig rten dag la shes pa'i stobs kyang bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-5: 'gro ba rnams la thob pa ngas bshad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-6: de kun mtshan ma rnam par spangs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-7: 'di na gang dag bdag gis thob sems pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-8: de ni ma thob thob par rlom sems byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-9: 'jig rten dag na gang dag ngoms med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-10: de la thob pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-11: thob dang thob med 'gro la ston mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-12: gang gis de ltar shes pa de thob yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-13: kun las khyad zhugs 'bras bu thob pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-14: sems can de ngas sems can med par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-15: de la sems can nam yang dmigs med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-16: sems can med na gang gis 'thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-17: zhing dngos gang la sa bon yod min pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-18: de la myu gu skye ba med pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-19: de bzhin sems can nam yang dmigs su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-20: sems can med la thob pa ga la yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-21: sems can 'di kun mya ngan 'das pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-22: 'di la rtsa ba nam yang dmigs su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-23: gang zhig chos tshul 'di la mos gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-24: de ngas lhag med mya ngan 'das par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-25: sangs rgyas brgya mang yang dag 'das gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-26: de dag gis kyang sems can kun ma btul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-27: gal te sems can 'ga' 'dir byung gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245a-28: de dag nam yang mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-0: @245b de ltar lam 'di sgrib pa yod min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-1: de la nam yang chags pa yong ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-2: gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-3: de dag yid ni sred la chags mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bsgrubs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-5: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-6: byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-13: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-14: sems can thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-16: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-18: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-21: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:245b-22: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:246a-0: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u stong phrag brgya pa @246a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:246a-2: 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:246a-3: 'dus pa nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:246a-4: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-006:246a-7: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
